atk-s0402a29:2_0: 104. Tatiyassa paṭhame pubbeva sambodhāti sambodhito pubbeva, ariyamaggappattito
atk-s0402a29:2_1: aparabhāgeyevāti vuttaṁ hoti. Anabhisambuddhassāti appaṭividdhacatusaccassa. Bodhisattasseva
atk-s0402a29:2_2: satoti bujjhanakasattasseva sato, sammāsambodhiṁ adhigantuṁ ārabhantasseva sato,
atk-s0402a29:2_3: sambodhiyā vā sattasseva laggasseva sato. Dīpaṅkarassa hi bhagavato pādamūle aṭṭhadhammasamodhānena
atk-s0402a29:2_4: abhinīhārasamiddhito pabhuti tathāgato sammāsambodhiṁ satto laggo ‘‘pattabbā mayā
atk-s0402a29:2_5: esā’’ti tadadhigamāya parakkamaṁ amuñcantoyeva āgato, tasmā bodhisattoti vuccati.
atk-s0402a29:2_6: Ko nu khoti katamo nu kho. Lokoti saṅkhāraloko. Assādoti madhurākāro. Ādīnavoti anabhinanditabbākāro.
atk-s0402a29:2_7: Tassa mayhanti tassa evaṁ bodhisattasseva sato mayhaṁ. Chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānanti
atk-s0402a29:2_8: nibbānaṁ āgamma ārabbha paṭicca chandarāgo vinayaṁ gacchati pahīyati, tasmā nibbānaṁ
atk-s0402a29:2_9: ‘‘chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahāna’’nti vuccati. Idaṁ lokanissaraṇanti idaṁ nibbānaṁ
atk-s0402a29:2_10: lokato nissaṭattā lokanissaraṇanti vuccati. Yāvakīvanti yattakaṁ pamāṇaṁ kālaṁ. Abbhaññāsinti
atk-s0402a29:2_11: abhivisiṭṭhena ariyamaggañāṇena aññāsiṁ. Ñāṇañca pana me dassananti dvīhipi padehi
atk-s0402a29:4_0: 105. Dutiye assādapariyesanaṁ acarinti assādapariyesanatthāya acariṁ. Kuto paṭṭhāyāti?
atk-s0402a29:4_1: Sumedhakālato paṭṭhāya. Paññāyāti sahavipassanāya maggapaññāya. Sudiṭṭhoti suppaṭividdho.
atk-s0402a29:4_2: Iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo. Tatiyaṁ sabbattha uttānameva.
atk-s0402a29:6_0: 107. Catutthe sāmaññatthanti catubbidhaṁ ariyaphalaṁ. Itaraṁ tasseva vevacanaṁ. Sāmaññatthena
atk-s0402a29:6_1: vā cattāro maggā, brahmaññatthena cattāri phalāni. Imesu pana catūsupi suttesu khandhalokova kathito.
atk-s0402a29:8_0: 108. Pañcamaṁ atthuppattiyā nikkhittaṁ. Katarāya atthuppattiyā? Chabbaggiyānaṁ anācāre.
atk-s0402a29:8_1: Te kira gāyantā naccantā hasantā vicariṁsu. Bhikkhū dasabalassa ārocayiṁsu. Satthā
atk-s0402a29:8_2: te pakkosāpetvā tesaṁ ovādatthāya idaṁ suttaṁ ārabhi. Tattha ruṇṇanti roditaṁ. Ummattakanti
atk-s0402a29:8_3: ummattakakiriyā. Komārakanti kumārakehi kattabbakiccaṁ. Dantavidaṁsakahasitanti dante
atk-s0402a29:8_4: dassetvā pāṇiṁ paharantānaṁ mahāsaddena hasitaṁ. Setughāto gīteti gīte vo paccayaghāto
atk-s0402a29:8_5: hotu, sahetukaṁ gītaṁ pajahathāti dīpeti. Naccepi eseva nayo. Alanti yuttaṁ. Dhammappamoditānaṁ
atk-s0402a29:8_6: satanti ettha dhammo vuccati kāraṇaṁ, kenacideva kāraṇena pamuditānaṁ santānaṁ. Sitaṁ
atk-s0402a29:8_7: sitamattāyāti tasmiṁ sitakāraṇe sati yaṁ sitaṁ karotha, taṁ vo sitamattāya aggadante
atk-s0402a29:10_0: 109. Chaṭṭhe soppassāti niddāya. Paṭisevanāya natthi tittīti yathā yathā paṭisevati,
atk-s0402a29:10_1: tathā tathā ruccatiyevāti titti nāma natthi. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Sace hi
atk-s0402a29:10_2: mahāsamudde udakaṁ surā bhaveyya, surāsoṇḍo ca maccho hutvā nibbatteyya, tassa tattha
atk-s0402a29:10_3: carantassapi sayantassapi titti nāma na bhaveyya. Imasmiṁ sutte vaṭṭameva kathitaṁ.
atk-s0402a29:12_0: 110. Sattame avassutaṁ hotīti tintaṁ hoti. Na bhaddakaṁ maraṇaṁ hotīti apāye paṭisandhipaccayatāya
atk-s0402a29:12_1: na laddhakaṁ hoti. Kālakiriyāti tasseva vevacanaṁ. Sukkapakkhe sagge paṭisandhipaccayatāya
atk-s0402a29:12_2: bhaddakaṁ hoti laddhakaṁ. Taṁ pana ekantena sotāpannādīnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ ariyasāvakānaṁyeva
atk-s0402a29:14: 111. Aṭṭhame byāpannanti pakatibhāvaṁ jahitvā ṭhitaṁ. Sesaṁ purimasutte vuttanayameva.
atk-s0402a29:16_0: 112. Navame nidānānīti kāraṇāni. Kammānaṁ samudayāyāti vaṭṭagāmikammānaṁ piṇḍakaraṇatthāya.
atk-s0402a29:16_1: Lobhapakatanti lobhena pakataṁ. Sāvajjanti sadosaṁ. Taṁ kammaṁ kammasamudayāya saṁvattatīti
atk-s0402a29:16_2: taṁ kammaṁ aññesampi vaṭṭagāmikammānaṁ samudayāya piṇḍakaraṇatthāya saṁvattati. Na
atk-s0402a29:16_3: taṁ kammaṁ kammanirodhāyāti taṁ pana kammaṁ vaṭṭagāmikammānaṁ nirodhatthāya na saṁvattati.
atk-s0402a29:16_4: Sukkapakkhe kammānaṁ samudayāyāti vivaṭṭagāmikammānaṁ samudayatthāya. Iminā nayena
atk-s0402a29:18_0: 113. Dasame kammānanti vaṭṭagāmikammānameva. Chandarāgaṭṭhāniyeti chandarāgassa kāraṇabhūte.
atk-s0402a29:18_1: Ārabbhāti āgamma sandhāya paṭicca. Chandoti taṇhāchando. Yo cetaso sārāgoti yo cittassa
atk-s0402a29:18_2: rāgo rajjanā rajjitattaṁ, etamahaṁ saṁyojanaṁ vadāmi, bandhanaṁ vadāmīti attho. Sukkapakkhe
atk-s0402a29:18_3: kammānanti vivaṭṭagāmikammānaṁ. Tadabhinivattetīti taṁ abhinivatteti. Yadā vā tena
atk-s0402a29:18_4: vipāko ñāto hoti vidito, tadā te ceva dhamme tañca vipākaṁ abhinivatteti. Iminā ca
atk-s0402a29:18_5: padena vipassanā kathitā, tadabhinivattetvāti iminā maggo. Cetasā abhinivijjhitvāti
atk-s0402a29:18_6: iminā ca maggova. Paññāya ativijjha passatīti saha vipassanāya maggapaññāya nibbijjhitvā
atk-s0402a29:18_7: passati. Evaṁ sabbattha attho veditabbo. Imasmiṁ pana sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṁ kathitanti.
